p: In order to make MgSc 2Se 4 as an applicable solid-state conductor, Wang and Fichtner tried two strategies to reduce the electronic conductivity of MgSc 2Se 4, including synthesizing Se-rich phase and doping with Ce 4+ or ti 4+ to partially substitute Sc 3+ (Wang et al., 2019). However, neither methods could successfully reduce the electronic conductivity. The authors suggested to employ MgSc 2Se 4 as a surface coating to protect Mg anode or cathode materials.
